title: Virtual Assistant Competition – Top 10 Advance!
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant Competition – Top 10 Advance!
Ready to compete for a paid VA role with instant feedback on our live dashboard? Apply now—no experience needed!

Job Description
Ready for a challenge? Join our Virtual Assistant Hiring Competition and show us what you’ve got!

We’re searching for motivated, organized individuals to support our real estate investment business. No prior experience is required—if you’re proactive, willing to learn, and love a little friendly competition, you could be exactly who we’re looking for.

What makes our process different?

It’s a competition! You’ll complete a quick skills and logic challenge. 

Instant results: See your score and live ranking on our public leaderboard the Upgrade to see actual infont you submit.

Top 10 applicants will be invited to a project-based interview.

Responsibilities (if selected):

- Gather and organize property lists from county sites
- Track business metrics and update our CRM
- Assist with transaction coordination and document review
- Tag and label expenses in Excel or QuickBooks (or learn on the job)
- Support general admin tasks (calendar, emails, scheduling)

What we’re looking for:

- Independent, problem-solving mindset
- Attention to detail and organization
- Strong communication skills (written and spoken English)
- Excel or data skills are a plus—but not required!
-Willingness to learn new tools and processes

How to Apply:
Click the link below, complete the competition form, and see your results right away.
Top 10 scorers will move on to the next round with a paid project task!

Upgrade to see actual info

Jump in, have fun, and compete for your spot on our elite team. Good luck—we can’t wait to see how you do!
